data.lyric:
[ti:Past Life]
[ar:Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez]
[al:Past Life]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Past Life - Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez (赛琳娜·戈麦斯)
[00:00.38]Lyrics by：Sean Myer/Trevor Daniel Neill/Finneas O'Connell/Caroline Pennell/Mick Coogan/Jay Stolar/Selena Gomez
[00:00.76]Composed by：Sean Myer/Trevor Daniel Neill/Finneas O'Connell/Caroline Pennell/Mick Coogan/Jay Stolar/Selena Gomez
[00:01.15]Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez：
[00:12.26]I'm trying to be honest with my happiness
[00:14.70]Don't know why I'm bad at this uh
[00:18.33]And I don't wanna sit in all my sadness
[00:20.85]I know it's a habit of mine
[00:23.58]Selena Gomez/Trevor Daniel：
[00:24.53]Perfect perfect timing
[00:27.15]I start but I don't know how to end
[00:30.45]Don't re- don't remind me
[00:33.22]I ruined it before it began oh
[00:36.30]Selena Gomez/Trevor Daniel：
[00:36.97]Last night was the last night of my past life
[00:39.76]Got me here like you can never figure me out
[00:43.01]Last night was the last time was the last time
[00:46.71]I'll never let you figure me out
[00:48.84]Sitting here talking to myself
[00:50.84]Thinking how I used to use you
[00:52.95]Only thing I'm used to
[00:54.82]Last night was the last time was the last time woah
[00:59.79]Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez：
[01:00.61]Gave me what I wanted when I needed it
[01:02.74]Honestly I mean it
[01:06.30]And if I could convince myself to feel it
[01:08.67]You know I would feel it I would
[01:11.31]Selena Gomez/Trevor Daniel：
[01:12.57]Perfect perfect timing
[01:15.20]I start but I don't know how to end
[01:18.31]Don't re- don't remind me
[01:21.39]I ruined it before it began oh
[01:24.15]Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez：
[01:24.90]Last night was the last night of my past life
[01:27.89]Got me here like you can never figure me out
[01:30.92]Last night was the last time was the last time
[01:34.88]I'll never let you figure me out
[01:36.87]Sitting here talking to myself
[01:38.71]Thinking how I used to use you
[01:41.09]Only thing I'm used to
[01:42.92]Last night was the last night of my past life woah
[01:47.43]Trevor Daniel：
[01:47.85]Oh woah woah woah
[01:53.83]Oh woah woah woah
[01:59.33]Selena Gomez/Trevor Daniel：
[02:00.88]Last night was the last night of my past life
[02:03.77]Got me here like you can never figure me out
[02:07.00]Last night was the last time was the last time
[02:10.80]I'll never let you figure me out
[02:13.01]Sitting here talking to myself
[02:14.75]Thinking how I used to use you
[02:17.00]Only thing I'm used to
[02:18.71]Last night was the last night of my past life woah
[02:23.38]Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez：
[02:24.06]Oh woah woah woah
[02:29.77]Oh woah woah woah
[02:35.84]Oh
[02:37.31]Where we've been
[02:38.67]What we know
[02:39.36]Woah woah woah
[02:40.90]Will never go away
[02:42.79]Oh
[02:43.61]Will never go away
[02:45.61]Woah woah woah
[02:47.18]Trevor Daniel：
[02:49.14]Where we've been
[02:50.72]What we know
[02:52.55]Will never go away
[02:55.39]Will never go away
data.trans:
[ti:Past Life]
[ar:Trevor Daniel/Selena Gomez]
[al:Past Life]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.76]//
[00:01.15]//
[00:12.26]我努力地让自己是发自内心的快乐
[00:14.70]却不知为何我并不擅长于此
[00:18.33]我并不愿自己沉溺于悲伤之中无法自拔
[00:20.85]即便我知道这已成了我不可或缺的习惯
[00:23.58]//
[00:24.53]绝佳的完美时机
[00:27.15]重新迈出的步伐却不知该哪里止步
[00:30.45]不必 不必善意提醒
[00:33.22]因为一开始 我就已毁了这良机
[00:36.30]//
[00:36.97]昨夜 只会是过往前生的最后一夜
[00:39.76]我踟蹰不前 而你似乎不曾懂我
[00:43.01]告别昨夜 挥手向前
[00:46.71]我绝不会让你看透我的心事
[00:48.84]安坐于此 自言自语
[00:50.84]回想着过去我是怎样依赖你
[00:52.95]那是我唯一熟稔的习惯
[00:54.82]告别昨夜 挥手向前
[00:59.79]//
[01:00.61]就在我寻求援手时 让我如愿以偿吧
[01:02.74]老实说 我是真心实意的
[01:06.30]如果我能劝自己相信
[01:08.67]你知道我能感受到那份情谊 我一定会的
[01:11.31]//
[01:12.57]绝佳的完美时机
[01:15.20]重新迈出的步伐却不知该哪里止步
[01:18.31]不必 不必善意提醒
[01:21.39]因为一开始 我就已毁了这良机
[01:24.15]//
[01:24.90]昨夜 只会是过往前生的最后一夜
[01:27.89]我踟蹰不前 而你似乎不曾懂我
[01:30.92]告别昨夜 挥手向前
[01:34.88]我绝不会让你看透我的心事
[01:36.87]安坐于此 自言自语
[01:38.71]回想着过去我是怎样依赖你
[01:41.09]那是我唯一熟稔的习惯
[01:42.92]告别昨夜 迈步新生
[01:47.43]//
[01:47.85]//
[01:53.83]//
[01:59.33]//
[02:00.88]昨夜 只会是过往前生的最后一夜
[02:03.77]我踟蹰不前 而你似乎不曾懂我
[02:07.00]告别昨夜 挥手向前
[02:10.80]我绝不会让你看透我的心事
[02:13.01]安坐于此 自言自语
[02:14.75]回想着过去我是怎样依赖你
[02:17.00]那是我唯一熟稔的习惯
[02:18.71]告别昨夜 迈步新生
[02:23.38]//
[02:24.06]//
[02:29.77]//
[02:35.84]//
[02:37.31]过往的一切
[02:38.67]熟悉的所有
[02:39.36]//
[02:40.90]永远是那心间的烙印
[02:42.79]//
[02:43.61]永远是那心间的烙印
[02:45.61]//

[02:50.72]熟悉的所有
